page.title: 04A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: DINNER WE GO OUT TO PLAY FOOTBALL AND WE COME BACK IN AT A QUARTER PAST ONE. WE THEN GET ON WITH ART AND CRAFT OR SCIENCE UNTIL A QUARTER TO THREE WHEN WE AGAIN GO OUT TO PLAY UNTIL THREE O CLOCK. WE COME IN TO SCHOOL AND HAVE A QUIZ OR A STORY FOR HALF AN HOUR . THEN IT IS HOME TIME .I GO HOME AND CALL FOR MARTIN DAVID ANDERTON AND I PLAY UNTIL HALF PAST FOUR WHEN I GO HOME AND HAVE MY TEA. I OFTEN CALL FOR MARTIN AFTERWARDS AND WE PLAY GAMES AND WE SOMETIMES TORMENT MY SISTER BY CALLING HER NAMES . THEN AT HALF PAST SEVEN I RETURN HOME AND GET READY FOR BED. I TURN ON THE T.V. AND HAVE MY SUPPER. CRISPS AND MILK ARE MY FAVOURITE. THEN AT HALF PAST NINE I GO TO BED. GOOD NIGHT. BY ANDREW WILLIAMSON
